bug.summary: Example code out of date after 1.0
bug.description: Especially matcher examples. Need to update or remove older ones. Correct example here: <denchmark-link:https://spacy.io/docs/tutorials/rule-based-matcher>https://spacy.io/docs/tutorials/rule-based-matcher</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
